Trigger/Condition: Identify who the Account Holder is
Checks: Look in Admin for Account Name / Email
Action: If the person calling is not the account holder, we can't take any action on the account. If the customer mentions booking though a third party service, they are likely a victim of a reseller.

Trigger/Condition: Identify if the product is a Transient, Event, or On-demand booking
Checks: . Event bookings will have an event attached to the pass under the start time.
Action:
On-Demand products are non-refundable. 
Event passes usually have restrictions follow merchant of record/special handling scenarios.
Transient passes should be handled as usual.

Trigger/Condition: Identify who the MOR is on the pass
Checks: Look in Admin for MOR field
Action:
If MOR = ParkWhiz → process normally. 
If MOR = AXS → Non-refundable. Refer to seller 1-888-929-7849 (exception Seller/Event cancellations).
If MOR = SeatGeek → Non-refundable. Refer to seller (888)506-4101 (exception Seller/Event cancellations).
If MOR = StubHub → Non-refundable. Refer to seller (866) 788-2482 (exception Seller/Event cancellations).
If MOR = Ticketmaster → process normally. For delayed refunds, refer to TM 1-800-653-8000 (exception: no credit)
If MOR = Groupon → process normally. For delayed refunds, refer to Groupon 1-866-956-1276 (exception: no credit, no partial refunds on multi-day passes). 
If MOR = Avis → process normally.
If MOR = GasBuddy → refer to GasBuddy (617-207-6686) (Let them know to select OPTION 1 when prompted.)
If MOR = Peasy → refer to Peasy 1-833-997-3279
If MOR = Tantalum → Pre-arrival passes must be canceled via the app, post-start passes should be processed normally. 
If MOR = Pay-By-Phone → Pre-purchase support is handled by PayByPhone. ParkWhiz owns post-purchase support and should be processed normally. (No credits)
If MOR = Edenred (Amazon) → process normally.
If MOR = Google → process normally. 
If MOR = Waze → process normally.
Recognition Phrases/Keywords: Merchant of record; MOR; purchased through; third-party seller; not ParkWhiz

Trigger/Condition: Identify who the Seller/Location is on the pass
Checks: Look in Admin for Seller field
Action: If Seller = Diamond Parking → Enter the refund request on to the Diamond Parking Refund Request Sheet. If they were approved, then they will be refunded. If they were denied, email the customer and let them know that their refund request was denied by Diamond Parking by using the canned response #Diamond-Denied-Refund. (exception: duplicate passes can be refunded without approval, but still needed to be added to the sheet under

tab, pre-arrival can be handled as usual)
If Seller = Parking Management →  Email the NYC team at nyc@parkwhiz.com via Freshdesk to request refund approval for all post-start refunds. (pre-arrival can be handled as usual)
If Seller = 75 Lafayette St. Lot → For all refunds, both pre-arrival and post-start, please email the POC Jose Lopez via a new ticket on Freshdesk. donpeperestaurant@verizon.net 
If Seller = Gale Force Sports & Entertainment (PNC Arena) → For all refunds, both pre-arrival and post-start, please reach out to Rob Seltzer via a new ticket in Freshdesk robs@pncarena.com
If Seller = Shamrock Parking, LLC (Seattle, Wa) → For all refunds, pre-arrival and post-start, please reach out to the POC, Brian via a new ticket in Freshdesk shamrockparking@yahoo.com (exception: duplicate passes can be refunded without seller approva) 
If Seller = Park-Rite → For all refunds, pre-arrival and post-start, please email the POC, Miguel Nouhan via a new ticket in Freshdesk miguel@parkriteinc.com (exception: For refund requests at 3110 Cass Ave and 3117 Woodward, email Mo at mo@parkriteinc.com instead)
If Seller = UBS Arena (OVG) → For all post-start refunds, please email the appropriate POC for refund approval via a new ticket in Freshdesk. Pre-arrival refunds we can do without seller approval. For NY Islanders Hockey Games: email Christopher Zabady (christopher.zabady@newyorkislanders.com) and David Koblentz (David.Koblentz@newyorkislanders.com). For all other event passes: email David Sampson (David.Sampson@ubsarena.com), Laura McLaughlin (Laura.McLaughlin@ubsarena.com), Richard Granato (Richard.Granato@ubsarena.com) and Giovanny Leon (Giovanny.Leon@ubsarena.com).
If Seller = LAM Parking → For all refunds, both pre-arrival and post-start, please email the POC, Arthur Gallagher (agallagher@lamparking.com), via a new ticket in Freshdesk.
If Seller = Tampa Sports Authority (TSA) → Pre-arrival refunds are always approved as long as it is before the cancellation cutoff of midnight and an approval email does not need to be sent. If it is past midnight or for post-start requests, Please email the POCs: Brandon (bflynn@tampasportsauthority.com) and Ashley (agreenfeld@tampasportsauthority.com) with the canned response: #TSA-refund-requests. Be sure to fill out all appropriate information and check looker to see if the pass was scanned. 
If Seller = Keefe Co. Parking → For all refund requests, both pre-arrival and post-start, please email the POC, Bertin Dakouo through Freshdesk via a new ticket.
If Seller = Hillsborough County Tournament Sportsplex → For all refund requests, both pre-arrival and post-start, please email the POC, Stephen Reed (sreed@tampasportsauthority.com) and Nathan Hasty (nhasty@tampasportsauthority.com). This seller as a firm NO REFUND POLICY. 
If Seller = City Parking → We only need to get approval for Paid Again refunds. The customer must provide written confirmation that they will NOT dispute the payment made on site at any City Parking location. Sendd the customer the canned response #City-Parking-Dispute through Freshdesk and once they have replied, email Lana (lana@cityparking.nyc) with a copy of the confirmation and the information on the parking pass. 
If Seller = Olympia Development Parking → All Olympia Development locations have a 3 hour cancellation cut-off (restriction). Refund requests post-start and/or for issues on-site can be handled as usual.
If Seller = SOMA Hub-255 Garage (Monthly Passes Only) → For refund or cancellation of monthly passes for SOMA Hub-255 Garage please email nicholas.paasch@propark.com, jay-li.poon@propark.com, gabriel.iniguezlink@propark.com

Trigger/Condition: Pass purchased through a third party or marked as Re-seller
Checks: Confirm reseller flag in Admin; check if Seller/Event cancellation applies
Action: Non-Refundable. Refer to the third party if it is a victim of a reseller, or if the reseller is calling, advise of the reseller's status.

Trigger/Condition: Determine if the pass is considered Pre-Arrival or Post Start
Checks: Check date and time on pass. If the pass has not started, it is considered pre-arrival. If the pass has started, it is considered post-start time.
Action: For pre-arrival passes, follow Pre-Arrival Scenario. For Post-start refunds, determine the reason for refund and folllow the respective scenario.

Trigger/Condition: Identify if the pass was used.
Checks: Check in Admin under History to see if the pass was used
Action: If pass was used, No refund.

Trigger/Condition: Pass is part of a half/full season package (sports or show)
Checks: Check bookings in Parkwhiz Admin to determine if pass is part of a season package (same sales id on multiple passes)

Trigger/Condition: Pass canceled before start time (unless season pass or restriction)
Checks: Confirm it's before start, check admin notes for restrictions
Action: Refund automatically, no agent/lead approval required
Recognition Phrases/Keywords: cancel before start; pre-arrival; cancel early; didn't use yet; before it started
Refund Reason/Settings:
Refund Reason: Pre-Arrival
Checked: Notify the buyer via email
Checked: Notify the seller via email
Checked: Refund the credit charge
Checked: Deduct the refund from seller's account
Unchecked: Mark as a chargeback(seller's fault)

Checks: Check in ParkWhiz Admin under the location's bookings to see if any other passes are refunded with a reason of
, check the customer's account to see if they booked at another location for same/similar timeframe.
Action: If under $50‚ refund automatically; if over $50‚ escalate to Lead
Recognition Phrases/Keywords: garage full; lot full; no space; oversold; location at capacity; turned away because full
Refund Reason/Settings:
Refund Reason: Oversold
Checked: Notify the buyer via email
Checked: Notify the seller via email
Checked: Refund the credit charge
Checked: Deduct the refund from seller's account
Unchecked: Mark as a chargeback(seller's fault)

Trigger/Condition: Multiple passes for same location/date/time, purchased within minutes
Checks: Verify passes details match, confirm which pass customer wants to keep
Action: Refund one pass (Refund Reason: Duplicate). If not within minutes, treat as Confirmed Rebook
Recognition Phrases/Keywords: charged twice; duplicate booking; two passes; bought twice; double charge; multiple passes same time
Refund Reason/Settings:
Refund Reason: Duplicate booking
Checked: Notify the buyer via email
Checked: Notify the seller via email
Checked: Refund the credit charge
Checked: Deduct the refund from seller's account
Unchecked: Mark as a chargeback(seller's fault)

Trigger/Condition: Customer rebooked a new pass (same seller/location)
Checks: Verify new booking exists, confirm same seller/location, ensure old pass is unused
Action: Refund the original pass under confirmed rebook.
Recognition Phrases/Keywords: booked new pass; rebooked; wrong time fixed; changed booking; booked another one; replaced pass
Refund Reason/Settings:
Refund Reason: Confirmed Rebook
Checked: Notify the buyer via email
Checked: Notify the seller via email
Checked: Refund the credit charge
Checked: Deduct the refund from seller's account
Unchecked: Mark as a chargeback(seller's fault)

Trigger/Condition: Customer had to pay again onsite
Checks: Confirm correct location, ask arrival/departure time, vehicle info, reason given by attendant
Action: If paid onsite at booked location, refund as Paid Again (no receipt required). If wrong location, issue OTC credit
Recognition Phrases/Keywords: paid again; charged at gate; had to pay onsite; paid twice; charged extra onsite; double charged
Refund Reason/Settings:
Refund Reason: Paid again
Checked: Notify the buyer via email
Checked: Notify the seller via email
Checked: Refund the credit charge
Checked: Deduct the refund from seller's account
Unchecked: Mark as a chargeback(seller's fault)

Trigger/Condition: Customer reports garage closed (gate down, no attendant, broken equipment, etc.)
Checks: Call location to verify, ask for photo proof if possible, check if other passes canceled same day
Action: If under $50‚ refund automatically; if over $50‚ escalate to Lead
Recognition Phrases/Keywords: location closed; garage closed; gate down; elevator broken; no lights; flooded; can't enter
Refund Reason/Settings:
Refund Reason: Closed
Checked: Notify the buyer via email
Checked: Notify the seller via email
Checked: Refund the credit charge
Checked: Deduct the refund from seller's account
Unchecked: Mark as a chargeback(seller's fault)

Trigger/Condition: Customer unable to access location (road closures, police block, event, etc.)
Checks: Ask which street blocked, confirm on Google Maps/Waze, check Admin notes, see if customer rebooked at alternate location
Action: If under $50‚ refund automatically; if over $50‚ escalate to Lead
Recognition Phrases/Keywords: road closed; blocked street; police blocked; parade; construction; can't access garage
Refund Reason/Settings:
Refund Reason: Accessibility
Checked: Notify the buyer via email
Checked: Notify the seller via email
Checked: Refund the credit charge
Checked: Deduct the refund from seller's account
Unchecked: Mark as a chargeback(seller's fault)

Checks: Check value of pass in Admin
Action: Pre-arrival pasess may be refunded regardless of the amount (follow pre-arrival scenario), post-start bookings $50 and under should be handled according to each specific scenario
